jobs_results.title: Sr Analyst, Business Systems
jobs_results.via: via MNC Jobs Singapore | MNC Jobs In Singapore
jobs_results.description:
Develops, implements, and sustains IT solutions to business problems to improve business processes, develop systems and policies, improve user proficiency, and promote system adoption in collaboration with key stakeholders.

Key Responsibilities
• Lead efforts to solicit business requirements, developing, proposing and implementing manufacturing technology solution options. Act as a Subject Matter Expert (SME) in the area of Labware LIMS, Maximo EAM, Camstar Manufacturing Execution System (MES), JDEdwards ERP, QMS and other enterprise systems.
• Serves as liaison between business process owners in Business Units, Functional Groups, Regions and IT. Support manufacturing operation and enable super-users (by training and performing knowledge transfer) to leverage IT systems for business process automation and optimization.
• Use expertise to drive digital transformation towards smart manufacturing initiatives. Design and implement solutions that improve business process efficiency and... accuracy for manufacturing ecosystems. Lead efforts to reengineer, optimize and enhance business processes and systems by assessing business pain points.
• Develop and maintain system documentation, user training, technical and functional specification.
• Configures and tests systems to execute features, integration, and reporting. Facilitate User Acceptance Test to ensure the deliverables met users’ requirements. Partner with software quality department to support validation activities.
• Works with stakeholders in developing ROI based business cases for enhancements and projects.
• Support other manufacturing IT systems, Report and Operation dashboard.

Education
• Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Business or related field

Experience
• Minimum 5 years of experience in Manufacturing Business Systems Analyst role
• Experience with Labware LIMS or Maximo or MES or ERP manufacturing module is a plus
• Experience with provisioning/configuring MES environments or ERP manufacturing and integration with other Enterprise Systems for processing and transactions
• Experience in partnering with manufacturing, engineering or quality stakeholders to perform business process improvement and drive digital transformation initiatives
• Experience preparing and tuning SQL queries
• Experience in project implementation, soliciting business requirements, solution design, change control and stakeholders management is a must
• Experience working with regional and global stakeholders is a plus
• Prior experience working in matrixed environments, complex global/regional business environment and highly regulated industry is a plus

Skills
• Strong ability to manage and deal with different cultures and nationalities
• Strong analytical and logical problem solving skills
• Strong interpersonal relations, written & verbal communication skills
• Possess and display sound judgment; initiative; flexibility and detail-orientation
• Strong documentation skills, ability to develop and maintain business and technical documentation
• Competent in handling multiple tasks with attention to detail, and perform duties with minimal supervision
• Ability to adapt to new technologies and rapidly changing environment
• Ability to map, troubleshoot, and optimize interfaces with multiple systems

jobs_results.title: System Analyst, IT (SAP ABAP)
jobs_results.description:
Responsibilities :
• Responsible for performing daily SAP helpdesk support, trouble-shooting on SAP reports and EDI/B2B issues for local & regional operations.
• Responsible for all SAP ABAP development, EDI and B2B-BizTalk development and enhancement.
• Perform SAP Helpdesk support, trouble-shooting and debugging.
• Perform SAP ABAP development changes.
• Perform SAP Sap script / Smart forms changes.
• Perform SAP EDI / B2B - BizTalk support and development changes.
Requirements :
• Degree/Diploma in Computer Science, Information Systems or equivalent, with 3-5 years' relevant experience.
• Prior experience in SAP Abap reports using ALV, dialog programming, BDC, Layout sets, LSMW and Data dictionary.
• Experience in User Exits, Enhancement points, BADIs and BAPI is a must.
• Experience in EDI / ALE and work flow and any middleware and B2B applications.
• Professional SAP Certification will be advantageous
• Any prior experience working with EDI / ALE and work flow and any middleware... and B2B applications

jobs_results.title: IT Application Support - Analyst - Service Ops - Level 1 - 2 Support - 5 Days - JO
jobs_results.description:
• Government-Link Company

• Healthcare Industry

• North East Area

• Basic salary up to $5,500 + Bonus (depends on experience) + Comprehensive Benefits

• Good career progression

Responsibility:
• Responsible for Level 1 and 2 support
• Provides remote or on-site IT Support and application support to end users
• Provide technical support for application related issues and performs daily service health monitoring, server maintenance and resiliency improvements.
• Responsible for delivering new and improve capabilities in systems monitoring, recovery and stability aspects of the system.
• Support and assist in regular server maintenance, system accesses, systems monitoring, backups, patching and daily health checks
• Maintain service operations documentation and guides. Develop supporting documentation for all Service Operation activities
• Monitor Service level dashboards, perform daily health monitoring, system capacity review and allocation of adequate capacity.
• Defect fixes and... resiliency related improvements
• Assist in training
• Assist in investigation of user reported issues
• Develop mitigating and/or preventive solutions
• Other duties as assigned or requested

Requirement:
• Min 2 year of relevant working experience in System / Desktop Troubleshooting/ End-user Computing/ IT technical support/ Application support preferred role
• Min 3-5 yrs of Technical / Application Support experience on multi technology platforms
• IT trained with Nitec/Diploma/ Degree qualification
• ITIL v3/v4 certification and strong service oriented experience / background preferred.
• Proven experience supporting Web / Mobile / Client based applications
• Entry Level are welcome to apply
• Able to work ad-hoc shift hours depending on operational needs

Other Information:
• Basic salary up to $5,500 + Bonus (depends on experience) + Comprehensive Benefits

How to apply

jobs_results.title: Lead/Senior Systems Analyst (Manage & Get Help), Software Engineering
jobs_results.description:
You will work in a Software Engineering & Architecture team to
• Deliver rapid, value-driven solutions for complex business requirements
• Leverage native Salesforce/Vlocity functionality to deliver user requirements quickly with minimal customization
• Responsible for turning the program design of our Solution Architects and Technical Architects into a configured solution that meets the business needs
• Work predominantly in Agile scrum teams, building out complex business processes using native Salesforce/Vlocity technology and platform
• Be involved in all phases of the project lifecycle - from low-level design and development through to integration testing, deployment and post-production support

Requirements
• Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or equivalent discipline
• Certified Salesforce and Vlocity Platform Developer
• Preferably 4-6 years of working experience in software engineering teams, ideally using Agile development techniques
• Competent in Java, SOAP APIs, REST... (JSON, XML), data and process modelling tools
• Hands-on experience in Salesforce (Apex, VisualForce, Lightning, SOQL) and Vlocity (Card, Omniscript, Integration Procedure, XOM) will be an advantage
• Understanding of best practices in Coding Standards, Deployment, Integration and Security implementations
• Familiar with deployment/packaging using Metadata API and ChangeSet
• Proven track record of successful delivery of enterprise projects, preferably in CRM implementations in the telco industry
• Ability to perform under pressure and tight deadlines
• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, comfortable with leading a discussion and doing a technical presentation
• Candidates with the relevant educational qualification but without prior experience are also welcome to apply

Job originally posted on GrabJobs. If you need to report this job please contact GrabJobs

jobs_results.title: Technical Support Analyst
jobs_results.description: Resourcefulness is a necessary skill in this role. You should be able to diagnose and resolve problems quickly. You should also have the patience to communicate with a variety of interdisciplinary teams and users. Your goal will be to ensure that our technology infrastructure runs smoothly and efficiently. Responsibilities (or duties) Ensuring that network infrastructure is up and running; Provide technical advice and fault resolution/trouble-shooting during fault escalation; Must be able to work independently and analyse problems before escalation or discussing with immediate superiors or Directors; Managing IT initiatives and collaborating with in-house technical staff; Troubleshooting system, server errors, software issues and outages; Installing and configuring software, hardware and networks; Analyzing system logs and identifying potential issues with computer systems; Sustaining network integrity, server deployment, and security; Monitor performance and maintain systems... according to technical requirements; Ensuring security and efficiency of IT infrastructure, managing user access; Upgrade systems with new releases and models; Maintaining internal technical documentation, manuals and IT policies Coordinate with client/vendor in ensuring smooth-flow throughout IT projects; Provide technical solutions in support of sales opportunities; Any other ad-hoc duties assigned by superiors or Directors; Requirements and Qualifications Proven experience, at least 2 years as a IT Primary Engineer, System Administrator, Network Administrator or similar role; Relevant Degree or Diploma in Information Systems or Information Technology; Professional certification (e.g. Microsoft Certified Systems Administrator (MCSA)) is a plus; Windows Server, Exchange/O365 support and configuration and ability to troubleshoot and correct problems; Knowledge of network security systems, intrusion detection systems, and data backup; Experience with Virtualization, NAS devices, Firewalls, Network; Expert in with Windows 7,10 desktop issues; Experience in IT Project Management & good in handling IT Infrastructure Projects; Exellent problem-solving skills, good analytical and communication skills; Resourcefulness is a necessary skill in this role. You should be able to diagnose and resolve problems quickly. You should also have the patience to communicate with a variety of interdisciplinary tea Skills: Active Directory, Analytical Abilities, Analytical Techniques, Computer Hardware Troubleshooting, Disaster Recovery, Itil, Project Management, Technical Architecture, Technical Support, Troubleshooting, Windows, Windows Server Experience: 2.00-5.00 Years

jobs_results.title: Senior Business Systems Analyst
jobs_results.description:
Job Description

Senior Business Systems Analyst

160022
Singapore, Singapore, Singapore
Apr 15, 2021

Description

Job Description

At Xilinx, we are leading the industry transformation to build an adaptable, intelligent world. ARE YOU bold, collaborative, and creative? We develop leaders and innovators who want to revolutionize the world of technology. We believe that by embracing diverse ideas, pushing boundaries, and working together as ONEXILINX, anything is possible.

Our culture of innovation began with the invention of the Field Programmable Gate Array (FPGA), and with the 2018 introduction of our Adaptive Compute Acceleration Platform (ACAP), has made a quantum leap in capability, solidifying our role as the adaptable platform supplier of choice. From the beginning, we have always believed in providing inventors with products and platforms that are infinitely adaptable. From self-driving cars, to world-record genome processing, to AI and big data, to the world's first 5G... networks, we empower the world's builders and visionaries whose ideas solve every day problems and improve people's lives.

If you are PASSIONATE, ADAPTABLE, and INNOVATIVE, Xilinx is the right place for you! At Xilinx, we care deeply about creating significant development experiences while building a strong sense of belonging and connection. We champion an environment of empowered learning, wellness, community engagement, and recognition, so you can focus on work that matters - world class technology that improves the way we live and work. We are ONEXILINX.

Finance BI & Reporting Analyst

Job Description

The Finance BI & Reporting Analyst will provide both functional support (business process and systems analysis, testing, user support and training) and light technical support (report and dashboard development, maintenance of Tableau views and hierarchies) to the Finance organization from Business Intelligence & Data Analytics perspective. As a key member of our Finance Infrastructure Team the Finance BI & Reporting Analyst will be a first point of contact for Finance BI report troubleshooting and development in our new Snowflake DW solution.

Primary Responsibilities
• The Finance BI & Reporting Analyst will work closely with key stakeholders across Finance and IT to deliver reporting and analytics capabilities that support our efforts to increase process efficiencies.
• Responsibilities include business analysis, requirements gathering, output and format evaluation, report creation and automation.
• In addition to helping to build new reports and automating existing manual and/or duplicate reports, the Finance BI & Reporting Analyst will provide ongoing user support to the Finance organization, including reporting tools training and troubleshooting of BI reporting issues.
• Individuals will also be responsible for analyzing complex data models and building reports to generate business insights and satisfy evolving management requirements.

Desired Skills And Experience
• 3-5 years experience applying analytical techniques to solve real business problems
• Advanced Tableau skills are a must (preferably with Tableau certification) experience working with Snowflake or other cloud-based data sources is very desirable
• Ability to retrieve, manipulate, and analyze large datasets
• Strong interpersonal skills; must be able to effectively work with Finance and IT users and be able to drive projects and reporting improvements
• Excellent presentation, communication and social skills, with solid attention to detail
• Ability to comprehensively understand data elements, sources and relationships in business and technical terms
• Bachelor’s degree preferably in a quantitative field (finance/accounting/statistics/engineering

jobs_results.title: First VP - Lead System Analyst - Real-Time Data Services - Group Technology
jobs_results.description:
Job Responsibilities
• Provide technical expertise and recommendations in assessing new IT software projects and initiatives to support and enhance our existing applications.
• Provideassistance and advice to business users in the effective use of applications and information technology.
• Work with business users to identify, define and document business needs and objectives, current operational procedures, problems, input and output requirements, and levels of systems access.
• Define and document business functions and processes, functional requirements. Write technical procedures and documentation for the applications including operations, user guide, etc. Write detailed universally understood processes/steps/requirements for use in development and training
• Assist in the creation of the system design and functional specifications for all new development projects.
• Ensure appropriate standards and procedures are adhered to during the development process to support quality... deliverables.
• Assist the project team in issue resolution to meet the requirements and timelines
• Define the training materials, and conduct formal system and user training sessions; facilitate train-the-trainer approach. Assist in training/mentoring other staff on the project
• Anticipate, analyze, address and resolve any functional or non-functional issues or risks either independently or together with the relevant stakeholders and propose alternative solutions as necessary

Job Requirements
• Bachelor Degree/ Diploma in Computer Science / IT
• At least 10years of technology experience with at least 4 years hands-on technical roles in the field and relies on experience and judgment to plan and accomplish goals.
• Extensive knowledge of data processing, hardware platforms, and enterprise software applications.
• Technical experience with systems networking, databases, Web development, and user support.
• Good background in data technologies including streaming, real-time analytics, real-time events processing, decisioning and offer management
• Good working knowledge skills with Microsoft Office Products, MS-Visio, MS-Excel and MS-Project.
• Experience in the development and implementation of standards, procedures and guidelines to support operational processes.

Be a part of UOB Family
UOB is an equal opportunity employer. UOB does not discriminate on the basis of a candidate's age, race, gender, color, religion, sexual orientation, physical or mental disability, or other non-merit factors. All employment decisions at UOB are based on business needs, job requirements and qualifications. If you require any assistance or accommodations to be made for the recruitment process, please inform us when you submit your online application.
Apply now and make a difference

jobs_results.title: Systems Analyst
jobs_results.via: via MNC Jobs Singapore | MNC Jobs In Singapore
jobs_results.description:
Responsibilities
• Ensure Application and Production Resiliency; review and manage development changes

Shortlisted candidates will be offered a 1 Year Agency contract employment

jobs_results.title: System Analyst (IBM Solutions)
jobs_results.description:
Reference Number: LND-200505-388

Our client with a total staff strength of over 350 in Singapore and China, is one of the leading and fastest growing business advisory groups in Singapore. Their IT arm providing integrated IT solutions for Systems Consulting & Development and IBM Solutions is hiring a System Analyst.

Jobs Responsibilities
• Perform presales activities with Business Development Manager
• Scope users’ requirements and propose customization needs to the client
• Prepare customization proposal
• Develop & conduct systems’ testing on programs developed
• Document functional specs and users’ documentation
• Conduct end-users’ training on the developed programs

Jobs Requirements
• Minimum 3-4 years programming experience in IBM Solutions such as Lotus Notes, DB2, Tivoli
• Certified in Lotus Notes programming (preferred)
• Exposure to administrative workflow (HR, leave applications, assets tracking
• Ability to prepare functional & users’ documentation

jobs_results.title: Management Information System Analyst
jobs_results.description:
Management Information System Analyst (MGR/AVP), Service Analytics & Quality, Commercial Service Centre, Global Wholesale Banking Corporate Office

As Singapore's longest established local bank, we are constantly on the lookout for exceptional individuals to join our team.

As a Singapore Quality Class (SQC), Singapore Service Class (S-Class) and People Developer (PD) certified department by Enterprise Singapore, you can be assured that Commercial Service Centre is committed to invest and develop our people.

If you are a go-getter with high level of drive to gain hands-on experience in a thriving and supportive workplace, do come and join us today.

• Manage department's information repository via touchpoints and CRM
• Analyse and report on volume & capacity trends, shrinkage, service performances and SLA adherence
• Provide valuable insights from data to support business/product directives and cost management
• Improve metrics for operational excellence, including service levels... adherence, forecast versus actual variance and occupancy
• Work as a team contact for incident management - check call/touchpoint drivers, coordinate with teams and update stakeholders
• Manage root cause analysis when service goals are missed
• Manage schedules and daily exceptions to ensure efficient staffing to achieve agreed service targets
• Work closely with internal stakeholders with required data & analysis to processes
• LI-VN

Qualifications
Requirements
• At least Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics or related field or equivalent
• At least 4 years of related work experience
• Strong working knowledge and experience in data management & analytics
• Knowledge and proficiency in at least Excel Macros, data programming & visualisation tools. Proficiency in workforce management tools is advantageous but not essential
• Strong project management skills and attention to detail
• Passionate about customer service with excellent problem solving, communication & collaboration skills to work at all levels
• Ability to think independently and to work under pressure
